long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AUTO MJ is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help streamline your MidJourney experience by automating prompt submissions and simplifying workflow management. Whether you're a casual user or a MidJourney pro, AUTO MJ provides seamless automation to maximize your creativity and efficiency.

Features:
Automated Prompt Submission: S

Customizable Settings: Easily adjust the number of sends per round, prompt intervals, and other parameters to match your workflow preferences.
Real-Time Prompt Management: View, manage, and reset your prompt list with ease, all within the extension.
Efficient Queue Management: Automatically manage jobs with a queue system that ensures submissions are spaced out to avoid overloads.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean, modern design that integrates effortlessly with MidJourney’s interface, allowing you to focus on what matters—your creativity.
Quick Access Panel: A blade-style sidebar that can be toggled on and off for easy access to your controls.
How it Works:
Setup in Seconds: Configure your prompt settings such as maximum sends per round and prompt send intervals.
Flexible Control: Adjust your settings on-the-fly and automate the submission of prompts at your preferred intervals.
Safe and Secure: Built with privacy in mind, AUTO MJ only interacts with MidJourney’s API and never stores or shares personal information.
Who Is It For?
AUTO MJ is perfect for creators, designers, and AI enthusiasts who want to streamline their interactions with MidJourney and focus on creative exploration.

Why Use AUTO MJ?
Time-Saving: Automates repetitive tasks, allowing you to focus on the creative side of things.
Customizable: Tailor the automation settings to fit your exact needs.
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly within the MidJourney interface, without any interruptions.
